subject: Re: this is wild _need opinions !!
author: Travis
full_text:
Thats very interesting the second one takes a few listens to 
understand it but its very interesting indeed. Great capture. Im 
going to create a folder here sometime in the next week, as I capture 
more. I didnt want to put old captures up. Anyway great work. Keep 
them coming, I love listening to others' results. Regards,
                                                      T.L.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> hey guy's
> I did another fm sweep this morning and was going over it and got 
this 
> really long message. pertaining to a spirit that I captured an evp 
from 
> on a cemetery investigation in Staten island NY, it mentions the 
spirit 
> by name and it's funny because it was the voice of a little girl 
and I 
> said a prayer for her spirit guide to find her and help her cross 
over. 
> This was about a month and a half ago. and today I get this message 
on 
> the FM sweep recording. I have posted only the two messages in the 
file 
> section under bhali sweep and sound file folder. they are the only 
two 
> files in there I deleted the rest so as not to use up to much space.
> The first is it's me Mandy and the second is named long file and I 
> believe it says "awaiting something_ a man named Saul _he'll be 
asking 
> for Mandy_ he's from our side_ he's a rabbi"
> 
> please let me know what you think. There are quite a few more and 
I'm 
> only part way through the recording.
> 
> Bruce
>
